---
name: variance-and-backpedal-management
description: Captures variance events and produces controlled replanning deltas with impact transparency.
---

# Variance and Backpedal Management

Use this skill when planned outcomes diverge due to scope shift, blockers, rework, or backpedaling.

## Required outputs

1. Variance log entry
2. Impact assessment
3. Replan options and chosen delta
4. Owner and due windows for recovery actions

## Templates

- [Variance log template](./templates/variance-log.md)
- [Replan delta template](./templates/replan-delta.md)
